text: ovun veta ovunge dutayin (pratiharyayangen) pæhædili dæya gena a avasthavanhidi, (evata ovun samaccal kara, pratiksepa kara dama, melova jivitaya sambandhayen) taman veta æti adhyapanaya (vrttimaya nipunatavayan) gæna imahat satutata patva sitiyaha. ehet ovun samaccal karamin sitimama ovunva vata kara gatteya
